backups

Class BareBackups

  • java.lang.Object
    • backups.BareBackups
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BareBackups
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class provides backup functionality (compressing, auto backup, etc.). It also manages underlying functionality of the GUI element.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Droogh (aka RJ)
    See Also:
    FXMLController, Serialized Form
